original_text: I will throw dirt at you. I will do with you like you were nothing. And I will make everyone ashamed of you.
korean_text: 내가 또 가증하고 더러운 것들을 네 위에 던져 능욕하여 너를 구경 거리가 되게 하리니

sentences.original_text: I will throw dirt at you.
I will do with you like you were nothing.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 아무것도 아닌 것처럼 다루리라.

sentences.original_text: And I will make everyone ashamed of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 모든 사람으로 하여금 너를 부끄럽게 하리라.
